text: @Feargal_Sharkey @suesustainable @DrmSqnc @EnvAgency Of course all rivers are polluted to some degree, that's inevitable. Yes, there's much work to be done, and agriculture is a major source of pollution. Look at my local river, the Tyne. How do salmon stocks compare to the 1950s to 1970s? Vastly better, due to WQ improvements.

urls.title: Regional Flood & Coastal Committees | Association of Drainage Authorities
urls.description: Each Regional Flood & Coastal Committee (RFCC) is a committee established by the Environment Agency under the Flood & Water Management Act 2010 that brings together members appointed by Lead Local Flood Authorities (LLFAs) and independent members with relevant experience. There are currently 12 RFCCs in England. The Environment Agency must consult with RFCCs about […]

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

text:
The River Lavant is a chalk stream, one of only 225 in the world. For the first 6 months of 2019 it had raw sewage dumped into it.

And the @EnvAgency do what exactly? https://t.co/SMs615PuwP

@Parrog3 @CharlesJardine @srbuss @wwf_uk @defra @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @IvelRev And you’d be right. We cannot allow abnormal to become the new normal.

@Feargal_Sharkey @CharlesJardine @srbuss @wwf_uk @defra I would strongly question how a river (Ivel) that is regularly abstracted to the point where it dries up can be classed as in moderate condition. entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
